long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you are coding, shopping, search something, or reading on web, you usually would like to get information from image. You can use this extension to extract text from image that you are looking on the web page.

Feature:
1.Extract text from Image showing on the web page.
2.Editing and copying text.

How to use:
The first, mouse is hovered on the image, then you right-click the mouse, choosing "extract text from image" menu. The last, tapping "Ctrl + Q" to check result. In the extension page, you can edit content and copy text.

Tips:
1.Only support jpg/jpeg/png/bmp.
2.Because network in some area is restricted, either you will get "timeout" and "url format illegal".
